def_cn: (通常指为了避免麻烦和责难而)与…断绝关系，表明与…没有关系
def_en: If you dissociate yourself from something or someone, you say or show that you are not connected with them, usually in order to avoid trouble or blame.
If you dissociate one thing from another, you consider the two things as separate from each other, or you separate them.
